review: As soon as I opened the box, I knew I was going to love it. The Fire was so easy to set up, configure with all my apps, and just use in general. My only complaint is the difficulty I've had with bright house to get my hbogo working on the tv. Everything else has been extremely easy. Amazon prime music playlists are free and nicely curated. I debated about which Internet/tv gadget to buy, and I am very happy I chose the Amazon fire.
